text:
@realDonaldTrump You're a flailing liar, and incompetent leader, whose unforgivable response to COVID-19 has led to the deaths of over 103,000 Americans, and 40,000,000 unemployed, now attempting to "explain" your violent horseshit-tweet from your racist, shriveled brain.

GFY, scumbag.
